title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.
rt_quote: A moving, inspirational tale of hope and perseverance.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief leads a team into the subconscious minds to plant an idea in a target's mind.
rt_quote: A dazzlingly complex and thrilling ride into the dreamscape.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his nemesis, the Joker, who wreaks havoc and chaos on Gotham City.
rt_quote: An electrifying portrayal of heroism and chaos.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a simple man with a big heart, intersecting historic events.
rt_quote: A heartwarming journey through life’s ups and downs.

title: Toy Story
description: A group of toys come to life and embark on a daring adventure when their status is threatened.
rt_quote: A groundbreaking animation filled with heart and humor.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American man uncovers unsettling secrets when meeting his girlfriend’s family.
rt_quote: A brilliantly unsettling and socially aware thriller.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.
rt_quote: A visually stunning and emotionally charged sci-fi odyssey.

title: Inside Out
description: Personified emotions navigate the mind of a young girl facing a life change.
rt_quote: A wonderfully imaginative and deeply moving exploration of emotions.

title: The Godfather
description: The powerful Corleone mafia family navigates crime, loyalty, and betrayal.
rt_quote: A monumental saga of family and power.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.
rt_quote: A beautifully crafted ode to dreams and love.
